about_the_game:
Demo Version Description

This demo is still in the testing phase. Players are welcome to join the player group to point out the shortcomings of this game and provide suggestions.

The demo includes the content of the first two days in the game, where players need to work hard to earn money to meet the landlord's rent needs and make a reasonable choice between work and life.

brief introduction

Blind Date Simulator is a text-based adventure game where you, as the protagonist, are forced by your parents to start a blind date activity. You will encounter various characters and try to satisfy their various needs to conquer them, ultimately falling in love with one of them and living a happy life.

Game Introduction

As the protagonist, you are a graduate who works as a screw driver in an electronics factory. Not only do you have to face a demanding boss, meager salary, but you also face parental pressure to get married. As you grow older, you are forced to start blind dates everywhere, but will the people you meet really be lifelong lovers with you? That's not necessarily true, is it?

Gameplay

Players need to balance the protagonist's living expenses and income to avoid bankruptcy, while also actively interacting with various characters in order to meet their true love and ultimately live a happy life.

name: 相亲模拟器 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card:

short_description: A role-playing game where players will interact with various female characters and try to find their true love from them.
